TopicTitle: A "Master volume" slider/Mute button in Settings

Articles.Content:
I often listen to music when playing KSP, and I sometimes find it irritating whenever I have to slide the volume of Spacecraft, Ambience, etc. to hear the music better, so maybe it would be convenient if we had a Master Volume slider to control it all at once, or if not, maybe a Mute button for KSP as well.

What do you guys think?

When working with KSP, I often have to swich to something else, with Alt+Tab. That's buggy as KSP will disappear from your tray, and you can only swich back to it with Alt+Tab again. Unlike other programs, if you switch away from KSP, the game won't be paused, and also the music will remain. That's why I turn off the music in the options. This should be fixed.
